'''Kujou Sara''' {{Lang|ja={{Rubi|九|く|条|じょう|裟|さ|羅|ら}}}} is a playable [[Electro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A [[tengu]], Sara is the adopted daughter of the [[Kujou Clan]] of the [[Tenryou Commission]]. Loyal to both her clan and the [[Raiden Shogun|Shogun]], Sara carries out her orders by the Shogun's will.
